question: Year 1757 is remembered to which among the following battles?
explanation: Plassey is situated in Nadia district of West Bengal. Battle of Plassey was fought on 23 June 1757 between Siraj ud-Daulah and the British Forces (Lord Clive). Siraj was defeated by the British due to the betrayal of Mir Jafar (Commander of Nawab's army). Siraj is considered to be the last independent Nawab of Bengal.
